text: min eadaa allah wamalayikatahu, warusulih min almalayikat 'aw albashar, wabikhasat almalakan jbryl wmykalu; li'an alyhwd zaeamuu 'ana jibril eaduahima, wamikal wlyuhm, fa'aealamuhum allah 'anah min eadana wahdana minhuma faqad eadaa alakhira, waeadaa allah aydana, fa'iina allah eaduun liljahidin ma 'unzil ealaa rasulih muhamad salaa allah ealayh wasalama
